problem.p: Soit \(V\) un espace vectoriel de dimension finie \(n\in \mathbb{N}\) et soient \(\mathscr{B}_1,\) \(\mathscr{B}_2\) deux bases quelconques de \(V.\) Alors \[I_n=[Id_V]_{\mathscr{B}_2 \mathscr{B}_1} [Id_V]_{\mathscr{B}_1 \mathscr{B}_2}.\]
